review: Very helpful and had no issues at all in root canal treatment. Definitely recommend for any dental issues

I underwent a complex procedure as my wisdom tooth had grown horizontally beneath another molar. However, the doctor handled it with great professionalism and care. He patiently explained each step of the procedure, ensuring I was informed throughout. I experienced minimal swelling and virtually no pain during or after the extraction. I wholeheartedly recommend this clinic for any challenging dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Helpful and explained to me the whole procedure well in detail. Also suggested me the right treatment based on my conditions
I am grossly dissatisfied. He indicated an exorbitant charge, in his own admission, for the suggested procedure being not sure to remedy problem for which I went to him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I got my horizontally impacted wisdom tooth extracted by Dr. T. Ramakrishna @Dental Profiles Clinic, JP Nagar 7th phase. I don't recommend this Doctor and clinic *** ******** ********** *********** 

Hygiene Issue 
The guy assisting the Doctor wasn't wearing gloves and a mask when the surgery started. After some time the doctor reminded his assistant to wear a mask. *************** *** ********** ************* ********* ****** ********* ** ** *** **** ** ****** **** ******* ** ****** ********** *********** **** *** *********** ** **** * *********** ** *** ******* When the Doctor is charging 6.5K for an impacted wisdom tooth extraction surgery, he should hire someone well-trained to assist him during surgery. 

Doctor friendliness, Addressing one's concerns
This Doctor isn't humble enough to address your concerns. I was shocked to hear his response to another dentist during surgery. Dr. Anvitaa reminded Dr. T. Ramakrishna that the patient wanted to know about the type of sutures used. He responded by saying "No Explanation".

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
I have not came across such a arrogant and rude doctor in my life. I had an appointment at 3 PM and when I visited the clinic he asked to come at 7 PM stating ‚ÄúYou stay in Bengaluru so it shouldn‚Äôt be a problem for you‚Äù. Also, other hand he is saying he can‚Äôt predict the power situation. I mean seriously you can ask a patient in pain to keep coming and checking if the power has came or not? My point is:
1. When you know that power is not there since morning then you could have rescheduled the appointment over the call stating the same to avoid any hassle for the patient. What‚Äôs the use of capturing the patient details then??
** *** *** ******* * ****** *** ******** *** **** ****** ** ***** ******* ***** *** ***** **** ***** ******* **** ** *** ***** **** ** ******* *** ********* *** *** **** *** ***** **** ****** **** ** ******* ********3. The way he was talking as if he is doing the treatment free of cost. Definitely will not recommend this doctor to anyone and will share my experience every where.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor doesn‚Äôt attend to the patient himself. His helpers does.
Really don‚Äôt understand this concept where you book an appointment for a particular doctor but he doesn‚Äôt even come and check.
Also the clinic is super expensive
Tooth extraction is Rs 5000. 
Root canal ranges between 8k -15k 
And cap is again between 8-12k 
So in one visit they told me 3 teeth require three different settings *** ***** ****** ***** **** ********* ******* ****** *** they will tell the final amount only when they perform it. 
Helpers were busy running here and there. One helper checked passed on the ipad to another who gave the meds and asked to pay the bill but had no clue about the medicines given. 
Had to run behind them to ask what med is for what. 
Very unorganised but yes super hygienic . They don‚Äôt even let the person accompanying the patient to enter the room. How much will a patient understand who is already in pain! 
Plus in the entire process didn‚Äôt see the doctor even once!
reply_text:
We are surprised by the allegations made by you 
1. In our clinic only doctors attend the patients since 25 years. 
2. The suggested treatment was planned specifically for the patient; however, the root canal was not at all advised.
3.The above charges mentioned was not communicated to you at all, our charges are way lesser than you elaborated. We have no idea about the assumptions made about the charges. 
4. Above all, we have a team where work is allocated as they are trained for it and all the queries are taken carefully. 
P.s Don‚Äôt expect the doctor to do the registration and billing etc. for the patients.
Keeping in mind the ongoing pandemic of COVID our protocol is to allow only the patient ..if U ha insisted we would have allowed the attendant. 
Please stop posting false allegations on doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had horrible tooth ache and realized it was wisdoom tooth related issue. Since I have never had any dental issues, I was scared to even meet a dentist! 

When I realized my wisdom tooth had to be extracted, I was very anxious and had my own inhibitions. After speaking to Dr Ramakrishna, I got the confidence that the procedure will be painless. After reaching there, I got to know that 2 of my wisdom teeth had to be removed! He calmed me down, and within next 5 minutes, he had extracted 2 teeth! When I was just the expecting that the procedure would start, he told the procedure was already over! Frankly speaking, I was very relieved! 

He did give some simple and basic instructions, following which, I have recovered completely! This is my 3rd day after tooth extraction and I'm all well!! In fact, the day my tooth were extracted, within next half an hour I went on Google and was able to write a review, I was in such a good shape! Today, writing a review here! 

All in all, I'm happy I got a doctor that I can trust! 
Thank you Doctor Ramakrishna!!
Very helpful and had no issues at all in root canal treatment. Definitely recommend for any dental issues

I underwent a complex procedure as my wisdom tooth had grown horizontally beneath another molar. However, the doctor handled it with great professionalism and care. He patiently explained each step of the procedure, ensuring I was informed throughout. I experienced minimal swelling and virtually no pain during or after the extraction. I wholeheartedly recommend this clinic for any challenging dental issues.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Nut shell story is I was happy and in a blink tooth was extracted. To the point. I simply said I don‚Äôt want to go for root canal and don‚Äôt want any implant. He understood explained things and got the tooth extracted.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Highly unprofessional:
 Doesn't explain the problem to the patient. Even after asking multiple times, he didn't give a proper budget and everytime went on adding few other procedures. 
There is no plan of action explained to the patient in written prior to doing any treatment. 
My father had to go for teeth extraction followed by a bridge. while i asked the doctor for the pricing he mentioned it to be 39k including extraction. My dad and husband also asked him about the pricing and he said the same. Later he charged for the extracted separately and said 39k was excluding the extraction. I'm wondering how can 3 people understand/ hear incorrectly!
 Extracted a tooth and left a part of the tooth inside. when i told the doctor about it, he said that was a bone. do you mean the jaw bone came out?
Everytime I had to remind him of the procedure that needed to be done as he didn't remember the case each time i went and rather suggested for additional procedures.
Doctor called for stitch removal and scaling. he removed the stitches and called me the next  day for scaling ( mostly he messed with his appointments and was getting late). Let me tell you I don't have all the time in the world to come to your clinic as and when you call when you cannot manage your own appointments well. I told him i cannot come again and so requested him to finish the scanning which he did then. 
Doctor doesnt't talk to the patient. Might talk to the attender. He instead has an assistant *** ******* **** **** *** ******* 
Bills - when you are taking the fees diligently then please also put the same effort to diligently send bills to the patient. Only after I requested for an ebill, was it given to me.

Lastly I chose to go to another doctor for rest of treatment *** *** ***** **** *** ********* ******

I have visited him couple of times for my dental issues but this time for my father's treatment it was a very bad experience hence would not recommend.
I really am not looking forward to any kind of explanation or excuses. 
All the best!

I recently visited Dental Profiles clinic. Dr. T Ramakrishna sir for my RTC treatment, and I must say that the entire experience was truly remarkable. Dr. Ramakrishna's friendly demeanor and exceptional treatment skills left a lasting impression on me. Moreover, the staff at the dental clinic displayed a high level of professionalism and friendliness, contributing to an overall positive atmosphere. I am extremely satisfied with the service I received and would highly recommend Dr. Ramakrishna and his team. It was truly a great experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have undergone multiple dental treatments like wisdom tooth extraction, fillings, crowns etc. I am impressed due to the following reasons- 1. Clinic staffs are very responsive and promptly answer the phone and assist us with appointments. Even on weekends we can get appointment. and weekdays at convenient time . Waiting time managed well. Doctor is punctual.2. Any dental emergency is attended to immediately. Based on urgency of situation..  3. Impacted wisdom tooth removal was done so quickly and efficiently by Dr within 10 mins, ( previously consulted dentist refused to do it as it was close to the bone). He is  brilliant and an expert in his field. 4. ** *********** ********** *********** * *** charges more or less same as  other clinics in Bangalore. 5. Doctor is extremely friendly and humble and approachable and clarifies all queries so patiently. Even for over anxious patients like me who are scared of dental treatments and asking all kinds of questions . My family members also prefer to consult.
reply_text: We're grateful for your thoughtful review! Your feedback means a lot to us, and we're delighted to know you had a positive experience. Thank you for choosing our services!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
One of my cousin reffered me to  Dr T Ramakrishna, 
This is was my first visit to his clinic "Dental Profiles".
Before starting, He explained complete process of tooth extraction how it is done with steps.
I was bit scared of this process, because I saw somany videos on this in YouTube. But when he started the process believe it or not I didn't even feel the pain of Anesthesia also after that everything happened in minutes. I'm really thankful to Dr Ramkrishna for painless tooth extraction process.

Thanks
Lohith R
reply_text: Thank you for your kind wordsüòä

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I am Air Commodore Ashok K Puri, currently with my daughter in Bengaluru for the last 4 months. During my stay, both myself and my wife had to visit Dr Ramakrishna‚Äôs Clinic a few times for treatment related to varied dental problems. 
   I must mention that I found Dr Ramakrishna to be an exceptionally competent, confident and compassionate doctor besides being a thorough gentleman with a very friendly approach towards his patients.
   His Clinic too is very neat & clean having taken all possible precautions during the current situation due to COVID-19. The supporting staff is also very courteous and respectful.
  I sincerely hope that his reputation spreads ‚Äònear and far‚Äô and more and more persons take advantage of his expertise and the facility that he has so painstakingly created.
        Good Luck & Best Wishes to 
        Dr Ramakrishna‚Äî
Air Commodore Ashok K Puri* **********
reply_text: Thank you sir..it means a lot

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Well procedures are not pocket friendly. went for upper ONE tooth removal but doctor persuaded to remove even lower wisdom tooth which could easily wait for next FEW years. I took his advice and got both tooth removed in one go.
would appreciate, if Doctor could run through complexity of the procedure and the recovery stages and give adequate reason for advising the extraction would also be nice. Just because not all wisdom tooth needs to be taken out. Lastly, paying more attention during procedure can reduce errors which cost patient recovery time. 
And staffs could contribute more than just hand over the post surgery care Brochure at the time of payment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** **** ******** *** *** **** **** *** ***** **** ** ***** **** ****** *** Dr. Ramakrishna is definitely one of those. No unwanted frills, no complications, plain and simple consulting. My wife and I got an RCT and cavity filling done respectively. With the Covid scenario running at the back of our minds, we were initially reluctant visiting a dentist. But Dr. Ramakrishna and his staff are thorough professionals at what they do. I hope more medical practitioners follow such precautions.As for the procedure itself, it hardly took 15 mins. What I really appreciate about the visit is that Dr. Ramakrishna tells you the issue and it's severity and let's us take the final call on the treatment. He never forces his opinions down on the patient, which is rare to find these days.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
reply_text:
hi..So according to u if the tooth is removed in 5 minutes ..we have to charge less and if the tooth is removed in longer time..we have to charge more..its not according to the time taken , its the quality of care..if the procedure is carried out in 5 minutes ..its reflects on the expertise of the doctor in doing the same and quality of care involved in this and again i want to make it clear ..this is not any supermarket to bargain..have your respect for doctors and care involved in preventing the probable complications.
Thank u

review:
Excellent handling, very clear and highly recommend 
We visited to tooth extraction and he finished it in less than 5 minutes 
Thank you doctor

tags: Value for money,
review:
Went for a general yearly dental checkup ( i had no pains or any tooth issues) and we were convinced by doctor to remove 2 wisdom tooth. As my brother and sister in law had already done similar procedure with him before (2000 - 3500 with stitches) we agreed thinking of a similar cost. But after the procedure which was hardly 5mins we were asked to pay 10000 JUST FOR 2 wisdom tooth saying charges have increased due to corona which was unbelievable.

And we were asked to make the payment preferably by googlepay or phonepe as card was not acceptable or had a 2% charge. We have never ever heard of 5000 INR for 1 wisdom tooth **** ** ****** ****** ** ***** **** *** ********* *** ** **** *** ****** *** ****** ** ****** ** **** **** *** **** *****  

We somehow had to borrow money from our friend and had to pay them for which we havent yet received the bill as well. My first question is what if we were not in a position to pay? Or we couldnt arrange money? **** ** ** ** *** **** *****  I definetly need justification for the amount we had given him today. When this doctor can take time to convince me in removing 2 wisdom tooth at the same time why did he not inform me about the extraction cost. 

I agree dr is good with his experience and his procedure is satisfactory. But right now i strongly request all of you out there who are visiting this doctor during this period to clearly inquire the costs before giving your face to him. **** *** **** *** ** ****** **** ** ********
reply_text:
hi..So according to u if the tooth is removed in 5 minutes ..we have to charge less and if the tooth is removed in longer time..we have to charge more..its not according to the time taken , its the quality of care..if the procedure is carried out in 5 minutes ..its reflects on the expertise of the doctor in doing the same and quality of care involved in this and again i want to make it clear ..have your respect for doctors and care involved in preventing the probable complications. Moreover sanitising the clinic after every patient with COVID, the scenario has changed completely and everything comes with in an extra cost and moreover we are ensuring complete safety of the patient. To prevent any kind of source of infection we are strictly following digital mode of payment.
Thank u

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Ramskrishna for my wisdom tooth extraction. I had done my x-ray of mouth from a local dental clinic and been informed that a professional oral surgeon is required to extract my wisdom tooth as it was very near the nerve. Initially I consulted Dr. Ramakrishna through video call in which I shared my x-ray with him. He clearly explained me about the issue and procedure, and answered all my questions. During the operation Dr. Ramakrishna was constantly explaining me about the procedure which made me feel relaxed. The overall operation went smooth except in the middle of the operation the electricity in the clinic went off and we had to hold the operation for about 10 minutes. Apart from that everything was fine. Post operation I got my stitches removed after a week and everything seems to be fine now. Thanks to Dr. Ramakrishna and the team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had apprehensions about my wisdom tooth extraction, as mine lower was totally impacted (fully asleep position) and upper was thoroughly decayed. Local dentist said that this will require a specialist as the lower one was quite close to nerve. 

Upon checking with my dentist cousin in Mumbai, I got reference of Dr. Ramakrishna and read through all his reviews on practo. Subsequently, I called him up and shared my x-rays (obtained through local dentist). He very peacefully explained to me and clarified my concerns. 

During the procedure, he constantly gave me very clear instructions and remained in full control of the situation. His skill and expertise speaks for itself and in less than half an hour, we were done with extraction of both lower and upper teeth. Post-operative care was very nicely explained. I had smooth recovery followed by suture removal. 

All in all, I would highly recommend Dr. Ramakrishna for his expertise and trust him to do complicated removals.
